altername_name: Crest of the Dragon King Hades of Darkness
name: Yami no Ryu ou Hades no Monshou
overview: Yami no Ryu ou Hades no Monshou (Japanese Romanji), Crest of the Dragon King Hades of Darkness (English Translation) is a Shoot-'em-up game published and developed by Casio, released in 1986 in Japan.
